snippet.title: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - The Treasure of the Midnight Isles | Trailer [GOG]
snippet.description:
✅ Link to the game 👉 https://bit.ly/3pYjW8N

The islands scattered across the dark abyssal ocean hide treasures untold – and horrors unspeakable. Board the grim cursed ship and venture into the unknown to find your fortune... or demise. Explore the vast archipelago full of treasures and dangers in a stand-alone rogue-like mode, or as a part of the main campaign.

Follow us on:
Web: 👉  https://bit.ly/3rpVmMh
Twitch: 👉  https://bit.ly/3vVI6CJ
Twitter: 👉  https://bit.ly/3fdOUFK
Facebook: 👉  https://bit.ly/2NWKVCw
